00023 class Object
00024 {
00025 public:
00029     Object();
00030 
00034     Object( const Object& );
00035 
00039     virtual ~Object();
00040 
00044     Object&         operator=( const Object& )      {return *this;}
00045 
00051     void            addReference()                  {++m_refs;}
00052 
00060     void            release()                       
00061     {
00062         if ( --m_refs == 0 ) delete this;
00063     }
00064 
00069     int             references() const              {return m_refs;}
00070 
00071 private:
00072     int             m_refs;
00073 };
